1.name: Do not mark suppliers company name
1.desc: Packaging should not be marked with supplier's company name.

2.name: Mark customers company name
2.desc: Packaging should be marked with customer's company name.

3.name: Mark customers references
3.desc: Packaging should be marked with customer's references.

4.name: Mark additionally customers article description
4.desc: Packaging should also be marked with customer's article description.

5.name: Mark exclusively customers article description
5.desc: Packaging should be marked with customer's article description only.

6.name: Mark packages dimensions
6.desc: Packaging should be marked with package's dimensions.

7.name: Mark net weight
7.desc: Packaging should be marked with net weight.

8.name: Mark gross weight
8.desc: Packaging should be marked with gross weight.

9.name: Mark tare weight
9.desc: Packaging should be marked with tare weight.

10.name: Mark batch number
10.desc: Packaging should be marked with batch number.

11.name: Mark article number customer
11.desc: Packaging should be marked with customer's article number.

12.name: Mark running number of packages
12.desc: Packaging should be marked with the running number of packages.

13.name: Mark date of production
13.desc: Packaging should be marked with the date of production.

14.name: Mark expiry date
14.desc: Packaging should be marked with the expiry date.

15.name: Mark supplier number
15.desc: Packaging should be marked with the supplier number.

16.name: Buyer's instructions
16.desc: Markings as specified by the buyer.

17.name: Seller's instructions
17.desc: Markings as specified by the seller.

21.name: Line item only
21.desc: Exclusive reference markings for this line.

22.name: Pre-marked by buyer
22.desc: Packaging should be pre-marked by buyer.

23.name: Entire shipment
23.desc: Markings refer to the entire shipment.

24.name: Shipper assigned
24.desc: Markings to identify a shipment, package or carton as assigned by shipper.

25.name: Shipper assigned roll number
25.desc: Markings to identify a roll as assigned by the shipper.

26.name: Shipper assigned skid number
26.desc: Markings used to identify a skid as assigned by shipper.

27.name: Uniform Code Council (UCC) format
27.desc: Markings according to UCC format are required. System of coding products where by each item/multipack case type is uniquely identified. A unique manufacturer Id is assigned by the UCC.

28.name: Mark free text
28.desc: Packaging should be marked with free text.

29.name: Mark case number
29.desc: Case numbers to be used for marking.

30.name: Mark serial shipping container code
30.desc: Requests the marking of the serial shipping container code to the transport container or packaging.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
